name: onemoreangle/php-marshaller
description: A small library with few required dependencies to serialize and deserialize PHP structures using optional attribute or annotation-based configuration

suggest.doctrine/annotations: To use annotation-based configuration, especially useful PHP < 8.0, otherwise defaults to attribute-based configuration
suggest.symfony/yaml: To use the YAML serialization format
suggest.ext-json: To use the JSON serialization format
suggest.ext-simplexml: To use the XML serialization format
